name: Harry Potter And Order Of The Phoenix
description: The book that took the world by storm. In his fifth year at Hogwarts, Harry faces challenges at every turn and the meaning of sacrifice.

name: Stolen Time
description: STOLEN TIME by Danielle Rollins is a twisty, YA time-travel romance set in both a past and futuristic Seattle where a con girl and young pilot serendipitously meet and end up on a quest together.

name: End Of The Point
description: An unforgettable portrait of one family's journey through the second half of the twentieth century, The End of the Point traces the fragile and enduring bonds that connect us.

name: Dog Man
description: Dog Man is a comedic graphic novel series by American author and cartoonist Dav Pilkey and published by Scholastic Corporation

name: The Roster Bar
description: In The Rooster Bar by John Grisham, law school and student loan system that they believed had lied about their chances at profitable jobs.

name: The OverStory
description: The book is about nine Americans whose unique life experiences with trees bring them together to address the destruction of forests.

name: Book Of Colours
description: This is such an unusual book. It describes how colours are perceived by a blind child, and every page has lovely tactile illustrations.

name: To Feel The Music
description: In every respect, this is a book about the creation of authentic human artistic expression, and what happens to it after that point.
